## eqDelta variable

Checks if `|a - b| <= ε` and adapts given epsilon value to the given arguments:

ε is factored with the largest absolute value of `a` or `b` (but never lesser than the given `eps` value):

`ε = ε * max(1, |a|, |b|)`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
eqDelta: (a: number, b: number, eps?: number) => boolean
```
